main event: A resident of Port-au-Prince, Haiti observed an unidentified flying object in the night sky on August 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was circular in shape, approximately 75 feet in diameter, emitting a bright light from its underside., The object hovered for several minutes before rapidly accelerating and disappearing from view., The object was described to have no sound and was visible against a clear sky., Two other witnesses were present during the sighting., The case was classified as unresolved by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a circular object emitting a bright light
witness description: a resident of Port-au-Prince and two other individuals
